titles.title: To correct technical errors in the enrollment of the bill H.R. 3377.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to without objection.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.

bill.summary: 7/21/2005--Passed House without amendment. Directs the Clerk of the House of Representatives to make technical corrections to the enrollment of H.R. 3377 (Surface Transportation Extension Act of 2005, Part IV ) regarding the amounts of appropriations authorized for certain highway safety programs.
